mapper.select:
select a.employee_appraisal_id, a.appraisal_id, b.appraisal_name, b.start_time, b.end_time, c.employee_name as follow_up_employee_name, a.score, a.status, a.is_draft, d.level_name from `wk_hrm_achievement_employee_appraisal` a left join `wk_hrm_achievement_appraisal` b on a.appraisal_id = b.appraisal_id left join `wk_hrm_employee` c on a.follow_up_employee_id = c.employee_id left join `wk_hrm_achievement_appraisal_score_level` d on a.level_id = d.level_id where a.employee_id = #{employeeId}
and a.status =1
and a.status !=1
order by a.create_time desc

select a.employee_appraisal_id,d.appraisal_id,b.employee_id,b.employee_name,b.mobile, c.name as deptName,d.appraisal_name,a.status from `wk_hrm_achievement_employee_appraisal` a left join `wk_hrm_employee` b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id left join `wk_hrm_dept` `c` on b.dept_id = `c`.dept_id left join `wk_hrm_achievement_appraisal` d on d.appraisal_id = a.appraisal_id where a.follow_up_employee_id = #{employeeId} and a.status = #{status} order by a.create_time desc

select a.appraisal_id,b.appraisal_name,b.start_time,b.end_time, (select count(1) from wk_hrm_achievement_employee_appraisal c left join wk_hrm_employee e on c.employee_id = e.employee_id where c.appraisal_id = a.appraisal_id and c.status = 4 and e.is_del = 0) as waitingNum, (select count(1) from wk_hrm_achievement_employee_appraisal d left join wk_hrm_employee e on d.employee_id = e.employee_id where d.appraisal_id = a.appraisal_id and e.is_del = 0) as totalNum from wk_hrm_achievement_employee_result_confirmors a left join wk_hrm_achievement_appraisal b on a.appraisal_id = b.appraisal_id where a.employee_id = #{employeeId} and a.status = 0
and b.appraisal_name like concat('%',#{search},'%')

select level_id,level_name, (select count(1) from wk_hrm_achievement_employee_appraisal b left join wk_hrm_employee c on b.employee_id = c.employee_id where b.level_id = a.level_id and c.is_del = 0 ) as num from wk_hrm_achievement_appraisal_score_level a where appraisal_id = #{appraisalId}

select a.appraisal_id, a.appraisal_name, a.is_force, (select count(1) from wk_hrm_achievement_employee_appraisal c left join wk_hrm_employee e on c.employee_id = e.employee_id where c.appraisal_id = a.appraisal_id and c.status = 4 and e.is_del = 0) as waitingNum, (select count(1) from wk_hrm_achievement_employee_appraisal d left join wk_hrm_employee e on d.employee_id = e.employee_id where d.appraisal_id = a.appraisal_id and e.is_del = 0) as totalNum, a.full_score from wk_hrm_achievement_appraisal a where a.appraisal_id = #{appraisalId}

select a.employee_id,b.employee_name,b.mobile,a.employee_appraisal_id, a.score,a.level_id,c.`name` deptName,b.post from wk_hrm_achievement_employee_appraisal a left join wk_hrm_employee b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id left join wk_hrm_dept c on b.dept_id=c.dept_id where a.level_id = #{levelId} and a.appraisal_id = #{appraisalId} and b.is_del = 0
select count(1) from wk_hrm_achievement_employee_appraisal c left join wk_hrm_employee e on c.employee_id = e.employee_id where c.appraisal_id = #{appraisalId} and c.status = 4 and e.is_del = 0
select count(1) from wk_hrm_achievement_employee_appraisal c left join wk_hrm_employee e on c.employee_id = e.employee_id where c.appraisal_id = #{appraisalId} and e.is_del = 0
